data.lyric:
[ti:Rainbow]
[ar:Kacey Musgraves]
[al:Golden Hour]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rainbow - Kacey Musgraves
[00:07.62]Written by：Shane McAnally/Natalie Hemby/Kacey Musgraves
[00:15.24]When it rains it pours
[00:17.45]
[00:18.57]But you didn't even notice
[00:21.31]
[00:21.96]It ain't rainin' anymore
[00:24.28]
[00:25.46]It's hard to breathe when all you know is
[00:28.40]
[00:29.63]The struggle of stayin' above the risin' water line
[00:35.67]
[00:38.50]Well the sky has finally opened
[00:41.50]
[00:42.37]The rain and wind stopped blowin'
[00:45.04]
[00:45.66]But you're stuck out in the same ol' storm again
[00:50.69]
[00:53.02]You hold tight to your umbrella
[00:55.96]
[00:56.65]Well darlin' I'm just tryin' to tell ya
[00:59.67]
[01:00.35]That there's always been a rainbow hangin' over your head
[01:07.20]
[01:09.39]If you could see what I see
[01:11.91]
[01:13.10]You'd be blinded by the colors
[01:15.97]
[01:16.75]Yellow red and orange and green
[01:19.55]
[01:20.50]And at least a million others
[01:23.14]
[01:23.92]So tie up the bow take off your coat and take a look around
[01:30.51]
[01:33.41]'Cause the sky has finally opened
[01:36.44]
[01:37.20]The rain and wind stopped blowin'
[01:40.09]
[01:40.64]But you're stuck out in the same ol' storm again
[01:45.49]
[01:47.84]You hold tight to your umbrella
[01:50.80]
[01:51.48]Well darlin' I'm just tryin' to tell ya
[01:54.58]
[01:55.22]That there's always been a rainbow hangin' over your head
[02:02.19]
[02:15.06]Oh tie up the bow take off your coat and take a look around
[02:21.90]
[02:23.93]Everything is alright now
[02:26.62]
[02:28.72]'Cause the sky has finally opened
[02:31.60]
[02:32.26]The rain and wind stopped blowin'
[02:35.09]
[02:36.01]But you're stuck out in the same ol' storm again
[02:41.55]
[02:43.47]Let go of your umbrella
[02:46.92]'Cause darlin' I'm just tryin' to tell ya
[02:49.97]
[02:50.74]That there's always been a rainbow hangin' over your head
[02:57.40]
[02:58.08]Yeah there's always been a rainbow hangin' over your head
[03:07.12]
[03:13.17]It'll all be alright
